docs.title: OceanEye: Easy Image Annotation
docs.text: OceanEye is a desktop application developed in C++ using the Qt framework, designed to simplify computer-aided image annotation. It provides support for annotating both images and videos, along with seamless one-click computer vision model training functionality - all locally.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text: To get started, install OceanEye. You are then ready to create your first project.

docs.title: Edit Media Dialog
docs.text: Add or remove multiple images simultaneously through a single dialog.
